org.drip.state.repo

Interface RepoEstimator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasisSplineRepoCurve, ExplicitBootRepoCurve, FlatForwardRepoCurve, RepoCurve

    public interface RepoEstimator
    RepoEstimator is the interface that exposes the calculation of the Repo Rate for a specified Entity.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy

    • Method Summary
